derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, plural of viscus (see viscus)

entry.def: Viscera are the large organs inside the body, such as the heart, liver, and stomach.

means.word_mean: 1. internal organs collectively (especially those in the abdominal cavity);
